description:
Kidnapped and left to awaken in the heart of a desolate woods, you must navigate through the twisted corridors of a decrepit mansion. Solve puzzles, find keys, and unravel the sinister horrors you keep seeing.

Terrifying Atmosphere: 
Immerse yourself in the chilling ambiance of Sinister Mansion, where every sound is filled with terror.

Puzzles:
Test your courage and intellect with a series of sinister puzzles scattered throughout the mansion.

Heart-Pounding Horror: 
Brace yourself for relentless scares, spine-tingling encounters, and moments of pure dread that will leave you paralyzed with fear.
name: Sinister Mansion
intro: Prepare to face your deepest fears in Sinister Mansion, a bone-chilling horror experience that will haunt your every step.
